subject: Re: [junit] how to write testcase for private method
msgSnippet: ... better to break your code into smaller objects and test those separately. ... use the junit task in ant ... if you mean what I think you mean, compare the
messageBody:
> just i have a small things to ask
> 1) how to test private methods

better to break your code into smaller objects and test those separately.

> 2) how to catch test result and store in the file. please if any body
> have the program please send me as attachment.

use the junit task in ant

> 3) how to test the methods with return the arraylist and object

if you mean what I think you mean, compare the results against known values

Steve
